review:
I had visited Dr. Sunil for a prolonged shoulder pain and the appointment was very easy with Practo, the staff were very friendly and basic analysis was done.

Dr. Sunil did a detailed diagnosis and I felt very confident after taking to him. He was so calm while explaining the issue and It was a muscle tear on my shoulder. We started treatment on the same day..
After 3 weeks time the pain is completely gone and I feel very strong and solid as before…

I highly recommend Dr. Sunil to anyone who has orthopedic issues..

Dr Sunil's expertise immediately put me in ease. From the moment I walked into the clinic I was greeted with warm welcome and the smile from the staff which helped me feel more comfortable. During my appointment the doctor took the time to listen my concerns, asked thoughtful questions and explain the diagnosis and treatment plan. he was patient kind. Throughout the treatment process, Dr. Sunil was communicative and attentive, following up regularly to ensure that I was making progress and that the treatment plan was working effectively. Their attention to detail and commitment to my well-being was truly outstanding.
Quite thorough and detailed in explaining the issue and next steps. Found the doctor and also the entire staff to be extremely friendly. Highly recommended.
Very good doctor. We'll explained and good medications. Listens all symptoms carefully and then gives advices

Excellent rapport with patient in a friendly approach really appreciable. 
Helpful staff.  Neat and perfect team work.

Good doctor and I am very happy this doctor treatment.
I have explained my leg pains and he given medicine it is very good and cured

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had visited Dr. Sunil for my mother who had sustained a knee injury. The Dr. was very patient in understanding the concern, throughly examined the injury, suggested only the required scans &  processes. He helped us understand the underlying problem and presented the various approaches of dealing with it in an unbiased manner. Highly recommend Dr. Sunil for a trustworthy consultation.

This was my third visit and my experience was very good. ** ***** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** ****** ** ********** My mom feels very comfortable speaking to him and we are very satisfied with the course of treatment prescribed by the doctor. Would definitely recommend him to friends and relatives.

Had been to nurture clinic after friend recommended for back pain .after thorough examination doctor explained the problem and suggested only excercises initially * *** ********* *** ***** ********** * ** ***** ** **** ** *** **** *******i would recommend Dr sunil and nurture clinic .

review:
I got operated for ACL TEAR ,very happy with the treatment 
Satisfied with treatment . i would recommend him for his skills and behaviour.
Dr. Sunil listens to the patient's problems very carefully & patiently. He is also very knowledgeable and is good at explaining complex issues related to the spine.
Great doctor . Kind and helpful stuff. My consultation happened on time without any delay .  Overall i am happy with my visit to him.
Very satisfied with the treatment. Thank you  doctor . I would recommend Dr Sunil for orthopedic related problems
Doc is good, but clinic does not honor the appointments. What's the use of appointment when they follow FCFS.

Dr. Suresh was kind and friendly.  I visited for a minor ligament pain, he explained the reason it could be clearly and gave me simple treatment to take care of it. Difficult to find such a generous doctor.
Very friendly doctor. Highly recommended. He listens to each problem carefully before prescribing the medications
Very friendly and compassionate. Will definitely recommend. He even took time to explain the issue and what are the lifestyle changes to be made to get better aswe

Very good experience meeting Dr. Sunil. He takes time to understand the issue, checks throughly *** ******* ******* *********** ****** Thank you and definitely suggest to visit him for any Orthopedic issues.

review: Happy with the treatment and the way he put on ease even though I had lot of pain. Clinic staff are very cooperative and well equipped with all the facilities. Thank you Dr Sunil.
The doctor is  professional and friendly. Explains the issue and suggests proper treatment. Overall experience was very good.

Doctor was friendly and he explained the issues & medications properly. I totally recommend him. I have been to many orthopedic doctors before in Bangalore but I guess my search ends here. Thanks to him.
The doctor was extremely nice and explained everything to me properly. 10/10 would recommend to everyone.

Dr Sunil was very friendly and helpful. He was the only doctor on Practo who was also available on a Sunday. Happy to have visited him! 

The clinic is very clean and the staff is also very kind.
Listened patiently. Took time to ask all possibilities. Detailed diagnosis and feedback. I get well soon for sure. Thanks a lot Dr Sunil.
Great, checked my current leg issue also provided assistance on the my bone condition and subscribed medicine. Thanks
Very friendly and easy way of explanation of the problem. Satisfied with treatment and would recommend for ortho related issues.
****** *** **** *** we had to wait for almost 2 hours. What’s the point of booking an appointment on Practo if we still have to go to the clinic and wait.

I went to dr Sunil after my appartment group suggested . Happy with the treatment and I am still recovering from thumb injury . only thing is evening hours lot of waiting because of more pt.

Dr. Sunil K. was very kind and friendly in nature.
I went there for fingur injury. He did check up of my finger and suggested to take x-ray as I was having pain for more than 2weeks. Fortunately there was no fracture or anything. He gave some gel to apply on it and asked to keep the finger straight using splinter.

It was a great experience .*** ** *** **** ********** Dr sunil .doctor is so friendly, understanding patient problem  and give a good advice to the patient . My experience is osm.  Clinic is awesome in terms of higenic.*** ** *** **** ****** ** **** *****

review: Visited Dr sunil for knee injury. Got operated for meniscus injury. Happy with the treatment of my injury and care given .

We visited Dr. Sunil N for severe Knew pain. The previous doctor suggested surgery but Dr. Sunil suggested for Knew injection. 1 month after injection has been pain free and excellent improvement. would recommend for any knee joint related problem
Dr Sunil explained the issue clarly and suggested the required treatment. He is quick and crisp in explaining the situation to patients.
Received instant appointment and issue is explained properly, got my xray done from the same place also docto suggested was helpful
**** ******* Understand patient problem. Good discussion and explain issue. Do not write unnecessary medicine. Prescribe best medicine.  Good for joints.
Doctor was very polite ans explained the issue so well. Treated the sprain perfectly. My 58 year old mother's pain was gone in just 3-4 doses. Thank you doctor.
Doctor was friendly and was clearly explaining what the issue was.He didn’t rush for surgery and was very honest.
The doctor was super friendly, explained everything with patience and in great detail. He was on time.

review: Thank you! Very gentle and polite doctor. Listens to your health issues in detail. I am satisfied with the treatment.

Dr. Sunil is very polite and listens to all your concerns with patience. Does not recommend to just take pain killers but provides a better long term solution. I would recommend Dr. Sunil for all your ortho needs.
Speaks well with parents and explains problem well. Doesn't recommend mri and xray unless needed. Taking medicines as prescribed. Hope the pain heals sooner .
Had tibia fracture underwent surgery and recovering from fracture.went to Dr Sunil after friends recommendation and dint regret the choice.thanks
